name: GlobalCollect
tag_list: online-payments, e-commerce, payment-service-provider, local-payments, alternative-payments, fraud-services, fx-services, currency-exchange
overview:
GlobalCollect is the world’s premier Payment Service Provider of local e-payment solutions for international Customer Not-Present business types such as internet, mail and telephone order.

GlobalCollect is a full service Payment Service Provider consulting clients on how to increase transaction volumes, expand distribution channels, and reduce costs by streamlining back office processes. Through a single-interface online payment platform, we offer access to an unrivalled portfolio of local and international payment methods in over 200 countries, including all major credit and debit cards, direct debits, bank transfers, real-time bank transfers, eWallets, cash at outlets, prepaid methods, checks, and invoices.

As a full-service provider, GlobalCollect offers a comprehensive Fraud Screening Service featuring a range of integrated fraud reduction tools to maximize Customer Not-Present transactions prior to authorization. Foreign currency exchange, detailed transaction reporting and reconciliation are added services that compliment our portfolio.

A pioneer of the e-payment industry with more than 15 years of experience, GlobalCollect is bank-independent and has the largest network of acquirers and banks worldwide.
